p: This research was funded and supported in part by the following grant from the Tri-Service General Hospital (TSGH-D109-106); the Teh-Tzer Study Group for Human Medical Research Foundation; the Taipei Veterans General Hospital (V109C-108; V109E-005-5; and V109A-022); and the Ministry of Science and Technology, Executive Yuan (MOST: 106-2314-B-075-061-MY3). We would like to thank Hui-Yin Su and Huan-Shuo Chang for figures editing. We also appreciate the financial support from the Female Cancer Foundation, Taipei 104, Taiwan, ROC.
